favourite.article: I just read the Letters to the Seven Churches this morning - now this! Praise God. Christ is in the midst of His church; each church an angel - what does your angel report to the Lord you did last Sunday? Bicker? Gossip? Want the Pastor out? Can't forgive that sister? What does your angel see you do? Are you dead, thinking you are alive? Is it all work and no substance? Are you wedded to the world, because "that's how it is TODAY"? OR will you stand firm and stand up for Jesus?

I like this song. My soul does says yes to God and I wasn't to how that I want to be right and that I want to know about His word and that I love Him and I'm going to stay on the battle field for Him. 15 years old and GOD BLESS YOU!!!!!!!!!!
